mapper.select: SELECT s.*,l.landName FROM shopinfo s,landlord l WHERE s.landId = l.landid
SELECT s.*,l.landName FROM shopinfo s,landlord l WHERE s.landId = l.landid AND title LIKE concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
SELECT s.*,l.landName,l.mobile FROM shopinfo s,landlord l WHERE s.landId = l.landid AND s.id=#{id}
SELECT e.name FROM shop_equ se,equipment e WHERE se.shop_id=#{id} AND se.equ_id = e.id
SELECT i.img_url FROM shopinfo s,img i WHERE i.shopId = s.id AND s.id = #{id}
